title: Game Crashed and i got Leaver buster.
body:
So basically my computer force restarted after a crash when  joined a ranked game. I was gone for probably 5 - 10 minutes while my computer recovered. Reconnected and eventually winning that match that I disconnected from. 
My question is is there a way to report this to leaver buster or something?

replies.body:
Regardless of intention, a disconnection negatively impacts everyone in the match. This is why disconnections are all treated equally and why penalties cannot be modified in any way. 

While I cannot remove your penalty, if you give me more details on your crash, such as error messages or specific behavior, I can help you resolve that and prevent this from happening again.
I wish there was but i know of none. Why isn't this a feature?
This has happened to me quite a bit actually. They need some kind of Veto to the ban.
